title: Is it forbidden to use Wooxy?
body:
Hi guys, I have just one question if it is forbidden to use Wooxy, program that would make (only) you see custom skins (champion skins or even map skins) or even create any of them. I saw some posts from people beeing banned "for using custom skins" but I also saw some comments that say using custom skins is not forbiden by riot itself, so please, leave comments if you know the actual info about this, ty and gl in Fields of Justice!
-DuskyHusky

replies.body: We don't support third party programs or modifications, and it's at your own risk.  One can't be sure about what other hidden content might be hidden in these apps, so I wouldn't recommend it.  More information on our [stance ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications)can also be found here.  Stay safe and cautious!
